Présent (Present).Je monte: I go up / I'm going up
Présent (Present).Tu montes: You go up / You're going up
Présent (Present).Il/Elle monte: He/She goes up / He/She's going up
Présent (Present).Nous montons: We go up / We're going up
Présent (Present).Vous montez: You go up / You're going up (formal)
Présent (Present).Ils/Elles montent: They go up / They're going up

Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai monté: I went up / I've gone up
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as monté: You went up / You've gone up
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a monté: He/She went up / He/She's gone up
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons monté: We went up / We've gone up
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez monté: You went up / You've gone up (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont monté: They went up / They've gone up
